bibl.title: Fourth Report of the Egyptian-Swiss Joint Mission at the Late Roman Fort at Naǧ‘ al-Haǧar near Kom Ombo (Upper Egypt).
bibl.note: Introduction. - The state of research at the late Roman fort. - Results of the Fourth Season (February / March 2008). - Excavations in the south-east area of the fort (trenches 5-9 and 13-17/08). The defences. - Buildings in the interior of the fort. - The pottery survey and work on late Roman pottery. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Annales du Service des antiquités d'Égypte

bibl.seg: Michael Mackensen & Mohamed El-Bialy, Fourth Report of the Egyptian-Swiss Joint Mission at the Late Roman Fort at Naǧ‘ al-Haǧar near Kom Ombo (Upper Egypt).

Introduction. - The state of research at the late Roman fort. - Results of the Fourth Season (February / March 2008). - Excavations in the south-east area of the fort (trenches 5-9 and 13-17/08). The defences. - Buildings in the interior of the fort. - The pottery survey and work on late Roman pottery. - Avec résumé en anglais.
